version_description:
We’re doing our best to make your weight loss easier.

Personal Profile
We’ve improved My Profile therefore you can manage your training plan easily.

Workouts
Now you can watch Full HD workout video in a landscape mode. Rotate your device to enjoy a guided video and improve your results.

We've also introduced some bug fixes and other performance enhancements to keep you moving.

Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

We're happy to improve the app further for your convenience:

- Added a widget so that you can see the training schedule info right on your iPhone page.
- Force touch on the app icon will now allow to quickly access the widget, training schedule and training stats.
- Small design improvements throughout the app.
- We've also introduced some bug fixes and other performance enhancements to keep you moving.

Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

Thanks for your feedback! Here are some updates for you:
- Now the application supports French, Japanese, Portuguese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish, German and Russian languages.
- We've fixed several minor bugs and made small improvements.

Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we reply to all the emails.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

Thanks for your feedback! Here are some updates for you:
- Now the application supports French, Japanese, Portuguese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish, German and Russian languages.
- We've fixed several minor bugs and made small improvements.

Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we reply to all the emails.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

We are delighted to present to you:

- Smart reminders to keep you always on track, monitor your weight progress and form a habit of working out regularly. To set reminders, please, go to Settings – Turn on “Reminders”.
- For our Premium users we are introducing Premium Club with constantly updating secret deals, promos and personalized offers.

Do you have any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com – we reply to all the e-mails!
Enjoy your workouts!

Thanks for your feedback! Here are some updates for you:
- HOW WAS YOUR WORKOUT - use new cute characters to describe your post-workout feelings. Keep telling us how you feel and we’ll keep adjusting training plans right for you.
- MUSIC - updated interface for better experience. Access music and find right fitness tracks easily. Stay motivated.
- ios 11 ready!

Do you have any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com – we reply to all the e-mails!
Enjoy your workouts!

Technical corrections.

Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

Thanks for your feedback! We've got some great updates for you.
* The app is optimized for iPhone X.
* We’ve added iMessage stickers to make your conversations playful and funny.
* New cool achievements are here: stay on track and enjoy an active lifestyle!
* We've fixed several minor bugs and made some improvements.
Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your emails.
Enjoy your workouts with the app!

We are happy to introduce the new updates!
The app got a great feature of syncing your training schedule with the phone Calendar.
Start your workouts on time and manage your schedule easily! And enjoy training: new reminders will help you remember about the upcoming workouts and stay on track.

Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@redrockapps.com

Great news! We’ve thoroughly polished up the app to spruce up your fitness journey, have fixed several minor bugs and made some improvements.
And, as usual, if anything comes up, we, support@verv.com, are always here to have your back.
Go ahead and get a kick out of your favorite workouts.

Got some awesome results to share?
Now you can choose how to do it. Pick a standard workout results card or make it unique with a photo of your terrific progress or a daily updated motivational quote.

Technical corrections.
Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.

Technical corrections.
Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.

Technical corrections.
Any questions or suggestions? Send them to support@redrockapps.com - we answer all your letters.

We want to make a difference in your experience and our new updates are the way to go.
We've made a few technical adjustments and got rid of the bugs.
Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@redrockapps.com

The brand-new Aqua Balance feature is here to keep you hydrated throughout the day and speed up your weight loss!
Your daily water intake is based on your personal parameters, so the feature works equally for those who start forming a healthy habit and for water drinking Pros. All you need to do is simply track the water you drink. And no need to always keep it in mind - leave it to the reminders.
Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@redrockapps.com

We want to make a difference in your experience and our new updates are the way to go.
We've made a few technical adjustments and got rid of the bugs.
Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@redrockapps.com

Your digital safety matters a lot to us, as well as your health and well-being.
Transparency is fundamental in building trustworthy relationships with you. According to the GDPR Policy, EU citizens/residents may now manage their data. We’ve updated our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy for you to be always aware of what information we collect and how it is used.

Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@redrockapps.com
Be safe,
Your Red Rock Apps

Welcome to Verv - our new brand.
A new chapter has just begun.

We’ve got great experience in weight loss, and it’s the right moment to move above and beyond. It’s about growing over: Verv continues to help you get a fit body, but it's also expanding its product line to benefit your overall health and lifestyle. Thanks for your support and for extremely valuable insights – let’s keep moving forward together!

Yours,
Verv

We are happy to introduce the new updates!
We improved sharing options for you to be able to share your achievements, big or small, across all your favorite social media platforms.
Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@verv.com

With every update we make certain you get the most of the app.
So here’s the latest: we threw a going-away party for our bugs and they’re gone by now. Also, a number of performance-boosting improvements took place to make sure your app experience gets only better.
If you have any suggestions or questions at all email us at support@verv.com.

Great news! We’ve thoroughly polished up the app to spruce up your fitness journey.
And, as usual, if anything comes up, we, support@verv.com, are always here to have your back.
Go ahead and get a kick out of your favorite workouts.

Great news! We’ve thoroughly polished up the app to spruce up your fitness journey.
And, as usual, if anything comes up, we, support@verv.com, are always here to have your back.
Go ahead and get a kick out of your favorite workouts.

We’ve been burning the candle at both ends to brighten up the app and make some offscreen improvements. Pick up where you left off and enjoy your journey even more.
If you have something to share, please email us at support@verv.com. We’re always here for you.

It’s done! We went an extra mile to put a cherry on top of your fitness experience. We’ve introduced several enhancements to keep you journey fresh and enjoyable. If you got something to say, you’re always welcome at our support@verv.com
